title: Something Funny, Grammy's, Julia Roberts, Carla's Reality Update, LBJ and more.
itunes:title: Something Funny, Grammy's, Julia Roberts, Carla's Reality Update, LBJ and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! This show is dedicated to those people who are feeling absolutely wonderful about their position in life. The nephew and his rich uncle talk about Christmas trees. The 2020 Grammy nominees were announced. Alicia Keys will host the event. Could Julia Roberts play Harriet Tubman or nah? Charles Barkley is under fire for controversial remarks towards a female journalist. Is Lebron James now allowed to be considered the G.O.A.T.? Human sex trafficking has become a major problem and the crew are here to heighten awareness. Miss Carla gives us the latest on Real Housewives of Atlanta in Reality Update and Steve has some things to say about Kanye. Jussie Smollett is suing the city of Chicago and the crew has a warning just for him. Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO talks about living a life of abundance, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
